1008786795297771520.text: One of my highlights from #E32018 was chatting with the original Cyberpunk RPG creator Mike Pondsmith about the impressive @CyberpunkGame demo, the lasting impact of Blade Runner, and why CD Projekt Red's new game had to be in first-person.https://www.gamespot.com/articles/e3-2018-heres-why-cyberpunk-2077-had-to-be-a-first/1100-6459843/?ftag=GSS-05-10aaa0b …

1006741512179236864.text: Day 1 at #E3 felt amazing - thanks for all your tweets, responses and tons of feedback. We’ll take some rest now - in the meantime here‘s a nice shot of Mike Pondsmith having a chat with one of our guests after a presentation. Back soon. #cyberpunk2077pic.twitter.com/Fsv8XqyVcZ

1006694786185691137.text:

#Cyberpunk2077 #e32018

1006690758592786433.text: #E3 also means hanging out with the cool guys.pic.twitter.com/g0rqwVkGga

1006672459691524096.text: What we are showing to media is work in progress - we’ll show more once the game is ready. For now, check your favorite media for first impressions.https://twitter.com/marcin360/status/1006665255223635968 …

1006648018651631616.text: 'First impressions? Holy fuck. Also, it’s a first-person game, despite CD Projekt’s roots in 3rd person games with The Witcher series. Don’t fear though, as much as shooting and gunplay are crucial – and brutal – it’s very much a modern action RPG.' - https://bit.ly/2JzeczK

1006627117919100928.text:
You are V, a cyberpunk. In a world of cyberenhanced street warriors, tech-savvy netrunners and corporate life-hackers, today is your first step to becoming an urban legend. #Cyberpunk2077
@maul_cosplay @maja_felicitaspic.twitter.com/PEF5FO6J4L

E3 Expo starts today! I’ve managed to crack a few passwords (it was easier than taking a SimStim from a total brain potato, if you get my drift) so expect regular updates!
